metadata.name: Banana Kingdom Land 1
metadata.description: Land in one of the Banana Kingdom's regions: the Bananatopian Jungle, the Neverian Peaks mountain range, the plains of Kong Steppe, and Apex City comes packed with benefits. Each region has 3k ownable plots. More than 28% of these are mergeable into deeds for settlements, neighborhoods, districts, villages, towns and city boroughs that you can claim and name on the Banana Kingdom world map. There are 2 types of land, titles and deeds. Land title holders will receive 15% of all tokens spent on their land and 5% of tournament prize winnings earned by tribes on their land. Deed holders will receive between 18-25% of all tokens spend on their land and 5% of tournament prize winnings earned by tribes on their land. Each title and deed's capacity for players will also double in size with the player base of the game. All title holders also receive a free Battle Kong PFP and Banana Token airdrop. Learn more at bananakingdom.com.
